disabled.label: Disabled
disabled.description: User is disabled and cannot log in to System

Owner.label: Owner
Owner.description: Unrestricted access including the ability to share and connect/disconnect System from cloud

Viewer.label: Viewer
Viewer.description: Can view live video and browse the archive

Advanced Viewer.label: Advanced Viewer
Advanced Viewer.description: Can view live video, browse the archive, control PTZ etc

Administrator.label: Administrator
Administrator.description: Unrestricted access including the ability to share

Custom.label: Custom
Custom.description: Use the %VMS_NAME% Client application to set up custom permissions

cloudAdmin.label: Administrator
cloudAdmin.description: Can configure System and share it

customRole.label: Custom role
customRole.description: Custom user role specified in System

owner.label: Owner
owner.description: Unrestricted access including the ability to share and connect/disconnect System from cloud

viewer.label: Viewer
viewer.description: Can view live video and browse the archive

advancedViewer.label: Advanced Viewer
advancedViewer.description: Can view live video, browse the archive, configure cameras, control PTZ etc

errorCodes.cloudInvalidResponse: Cloud DB returned an unexpected response
errorCodes.brokenAccount: Unexpected problem with account. Restore account
errorCodes.wrongParameters: Some parameters on the form are incorrect
errorCodes.wrongCode: Account is already activated or confirmation code is incorrect
errorCodes.wrongCodeRestore: Confirmation code is already used or incorrect
errorCodes.forbidden: You do not have permissions to perform this action
errorCodes.accountNotActivated: This account is not activated yet. Send activation link again
errorCodes.accountBlocked: This account is temporarily blocked. Please try again in a few minutes.
errorCodes.cantEditYourself: Changing own permissions is not allowed
errorCodes.oldSafariNotSupported: Versions of Safari older than 10 are not supported

passwordRequirements.minLengthMessage: Password must contain at least 8 characters
passwordRequirements.requiredMessage: Use only latin letters, numbers and keyboard symbols, avoid leading and trailing spaces
passwordRequirements.weakMessage: Use numbers, upper and lower case letters and special characters to make your password stronger
passwordRequirements.commonMessage: This password is in top most popular passwords in the world

sharing.confirmOwner: If you change System owner, you will revoke ownership from the current account. This action is irreversible. Are you sure?

system.confirmUnshareFromMe: You are about to disconnect this System from your account. You will not be able to access this System anymore. Are you sure?
system.confirmUnshare: This user will not be able to access System. Are you sure?
system.successDeleted: System {{systemName}} is successfully deleted from your account
